content: Do you know any jokes about doctors or heart health?

Sure, I can try to come up with a joke about doctors or heart health. Here's one:

Why don't doctors play poker in the hospital?

Because the stakes are too high!

And here's another one about heart health:

Why did the heart go to the party?

Because it heard it was going to be a heart-pounding good time!

I hope these bring a smile to your face!
